#include <iostream>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int
#define inf 1000000000000
#define mod 1000000007
#define pb push_back
#define mp make_pair
#define all(v) v.begin(),v.end()
#define S second
#define F first
#define boost ios::sync_with_stdio(false);

ll a[1000001],n,sum[1000001],k;
ll ok(ll x)
{
	for(ll i=x;i<=n;i++)
	{
		if((x-1)*a[i]-(sum[i-1]-sum[i-x])<=k)
		return 1;
	}
	return 0;
}	
int main()
{
	ll i,j,x,y,lo,mid,hi;
	cin>>n>>k;
	for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
	cin>>a[i];
	sort(a+1,a+n+1);
	for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
	sum[i]=sum[i-1]+a[i];
	lo=0;hi=n;
	while(hi-lo>1)
	{
		mid=(lo+hi)/2;
		if(ok(mid))
		lo=mid;
		else
		hi=mid;
	}
	cout<<lo;
	return 0;
}
